---
title: "Package index"
---

<!-- This file is an overkill for dverse but aims to show how to create a custom
reference the overrides the Reference component of the default pkgdown website
-->

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(dverse)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

custom_table <- function(data) {
  pick <- select(data, topic, title)
  knitr::kable(pick, col.names = NULL)
}

link <- "https://maurolepore.github.io/{package}/reference/{topic}.html"
docs <- document_universe("dverse", url_template = link)
```

### All funcitons

```{r}
custom_table(docs)
```
